messages.title: 3 great reasons to vote for Gwyn Williams
messages.content:
1. Lives here; wide experience at the forefront of agriculture, health, tourism and business
2. Knows that education is essential for everyone to maximise his or her potential
3. Believes that only with a strong independent voice in Parliament can we make the changes needed to revitalise the Vale of Clwyd

issues.education: Knows that education is essential for everyone to maximise his or her potential
issues.health: Lives here; wide experience at the forefront of agriculture, health, tourism and business
